name: The Dungeon One
description:
This is my third try on the Ludum Dare, In this time I have a more polished game. :D

It is a simple level and the objective is get the key and reach the door, at every step you lose a heart. Give a try!

There are Windows, Linux and MacOSX builds, but I only tested on Linux and MacOSX.

I didn't make more levels because I started on Sunday morning and I don't have a lot of experience. But it was very fun to develop this simple game.

---

Tools and Resources used:

  • Engine: https://unity3d.com/
  • Pixel Art: Aseprite
  • Sounds Effects: CFXR and sfMaker
  • Music: http://www.beepbox.co
  • Fonts: http://kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts
